name: Gravity Defuser
description:
Controls:

Mouse: Hold Left Click to aim, release to shoot yourself in that direction.

Objective: Launch your player into bombs, and knock them into the wall to diffuse them, but be careful, if they fall to the ground, you'll lose life! Launch the bombs into the giant red buttons for extra points

Epic Showcase of Gravity Diffuser Gameplay

A game made in 1 Hour for the Zero-Hour Game Jam! The game was made in Construct 3, as well as all the assets. Hope you all enjoy! its a pretty fun concept, I might work on it after this, maybe do some more interesting mechanics like dodging certain obstacles : )
Link to the Jam can be found here: https://itch.io/jam/zero-hour-game-jam-2021
